translation.en: From the beginning of mankind and throughout the world's history...
translation.zh:
自人类出现以来
纵观世界历史

translation.en: ...there have been clearly defined rituals of manhood.
translation.zh: 人类有过许多种明确的成人仪式

translation.en: See, these rituals were definitive...
translation.zh: 要知道 正是这些仪式明确定义了

translation.en: ...in determining the exact moment when a boy became a man.
translation.zh:
一个男孩在哪一个时刻
成长为了一个男人

translation.en: For example, there's the moment when a boy joins the other men...
translation.zh:
片名：像男人一样思考 比如 一个男孩第一次
加入到其他男人中间 进行了他人生中的第一次战斗

translation.en: ...in his first engagement in battle.
translation.zh: 进行了他人生中的第一次战斗

translation.en: Did you know they used to have public circumcisions in front of the village?
translation.zh:
你们知道古人过去在整个部落前
举行公开割礼吗？

translation.en: Thank God mine didn't go public.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地我的割礼不是公开的

translation.en: And the most significant moment of all, marriage.
translation.zh: 还有人生中最重大的事 婚姻

translation.en: That's right, I said it.
translation.zh: 没错 我说出来了

translation.en: In fact, marriage used to be the ultimate goal of boys and men.
translation.zh:
事实上婚姻过去
是所有男人的终极目标

translation.en: Because in the old days...
translation.zh: 因为在那时候

translation.en: ...it was the only way a guy could get what he really wanted from a girl.
translation.zh:
这是一个男人想从女人那里
得到自己真正想要东西的唯一方式

translation.en: See, now, today? Things have changed, people.
translation.zh: 而现在呢？ 哦 时代不同了

translation.en: I mean, men, we don't have to work as hard to get what we want.
translation.zh:
我是说我们不需要那么卖力地工作
来满足自己的需求

translation.en: We got the Internet, for God's sake. I can be whatever I want on the Internet.
translation.zh: 看在上帝份上 我们有网络了 在网上我们可以随心所遇

translation.en: Today, men have the home court advantage...
translation.zh: 如今 男人们可是有了主场优势

translation.en: ...which has left you ladies with several different types of men.
translation.zh:
这就给女人提供了几种
不同男人的类型

translation.en: I mean, I don't even know where to start. You got the Player.
translation.zh: 我的意思是 我不知道从何说起 有花花公子型 （花花公子型）

translation.en: Hi, Zekey. You sexted?
translation.zh:
-嗨 齐克
-你给我发的彩 "性"？

translation.en: -Those aren't mine, asshole. -You sure that's not....
translation.zh:
-那不是我的 你这混蛋
-你确定不是？

translation.en: Wait a minute, I'm not done. You got the Mama's Boy.
translation.zh:
等一下
我没说完呢 还有妈咪宝贝型… （妈咪宝贝型）

translation.en: Happy, Valentine's Day, sweetie.
translation.zh: 情人节快乐 亲爱的

translation.en: And you too, Mom.
translation.zh: 妈妈 情人节快乐

translation.en: Thank you, sweetie.
translation.zh: 谢谢你啦 乖宝贝

translation.en: I think I'm just gonna leave you two alone.
translation.zh: 我觉得我还是给你们俩留点空间吧

translation.en: Wait, where are you going?
translation.zh: 等等 你要去哪？

translation.en: It's okay, Michael. I don't want to intrude.
translation.zh: 没关系的 迈克尔 我不想当电灯泡

translation.en: -I'll call you? -Or not.
translation.zh:
-我等会儿打给你
-还是不用了吧

translation.en: Poor little thing.
translation.zh: 小可怜

translation.en: She's blond.
translation.zh: 还是个金发妞儿

translation.en: You got the Dreamer. The Dreamer's funny.
translation.zh:
你们还有梦想家型的
这类型的人很幽默

translation.en: So I quit my job.
translation.zh: 所以我辞了职

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: I wanna be a chef.
translation.zh: 我想成为一位有名厨师

translation.en: You wanted to be a paramedic, you wanted to be a PR agent, and now...
translation.zh:
你以前还想过成为一名急救人员
一个公关代理 而现在

translation.en: ...you wanna be a chef?
translation.zh: 你想成为一位名厨？

translation.en: Baby, it's my dream.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 这是我的梦想

translation.en: Really, Dominic? Because I wanted to be a ballerina and Janet Jackson.
translation.zh:
真的么 多米尼克？
我还想成为一名芭蕾舞者或者呢 珍妮特杰克逊

translation.en: When I was seven. Do you know what I wanna be now?
translation.zh:
那是我七岁时候的梦想
你知道我现在想做什么吗？

translation.en: Your ex.
translation.zh:
-不知道
-你的前女友

translation.en: And last but not least, you got the Non-Committer. Pass the ball!
translation.zh: 最后 还有永不承诺型 快传球

translation.en: This one is from me.
translation.zh:
（永不承诺型） -这是我送给你的
-好的 亲爱的

translation.en: All right, baby.
translation.zh:
-这是我送给你的
-好的 亲爱的

translation.en: -All right! Now it's a party. Drum roll. -Okay, big guy.
translation.zh:
知道了 现在才像是个派对了
请击鼓 行了 大块头

translation.en: Oh, my God. I will, I will, I will, yes!
translation.zh: 我的天啊 我愿意

translation.en: You will what?
translation.zh:
-是的 我愿意
-你愿意什么？

translation.en: Earrings...
translation.zh: 原来是耳环啊

translation.en: ...that I will always treasure.
translation.zh: 我愿意永远珍藏

translation.en: -You the man, boy. -Told you.
translation.zh:
-你是个好男人 兄弟
-早就告诉过你了

translation.en: -Yo! -You need a beer?
translation.zh: 你要瓶啤酒吗？

translation.en: Now I'm not saying there aren't a lot of good men out there.
translation.zh: 我不是说在外面就没有好男人了

translation.en: Take, for instance, the Happily Married Man.
translation.zh:
比如说
还有这种幸福的已婚男人型… （幸福已婚男人型）

translation.en: Which brings us to my personal favorite, you got the Happier Divorced Guy.
translation.zh: 这也就带入了我个人最喜欢的部分 你们还有更加幸福的离婚男人型 （幸福离婚男人型）

translation.en: Look at that smile.
translation.zh: 快看那笑容

translation.en: What I'm saying is, the balance of power has shifted.
translation.zh: 我想说的是 力量的平衡已经转移了

translation.en: But, Zeke, those aren't my only issues with Gail.
translation.zh:
但是斯齐克些不是我和科尔之间
唯一的问题

translation.en: It's the nagging, it's the yelling, it's the crazy mood swings.
translation.zh:
而是那些碎碎念
和那些疯狂的情绪波动

translation.en: I mean, you're not gonna talk to me no kind of way. I'm a grown-ass man.
translation.zh: 我说 你不可以用这种方式和我说话 我可是个成年人了

translation.en: -Grown-ass man. -You know me, Dom, I'm grown.
translation.zh:
成年人
你了解我的 多米 我很成熟了

translation.en: Them weren't the only problems you was having with Gail, though, right?
translation.zh:
这些不是你和科尔之间存在的
唯一问题对吧

translation.en: -Yo, Zeke, do not get that man started. -I'm asking a question!
translation.zh:
-嘿 齐克别让他说起来了
-我只是问个问题

translation.en: No, let's get me started up. Turn the key! Say it, get it out!
translation.zh:
不用 让我和大家说说 准备开始
快说啊 都说啊

translation.en: Rumor has it that Gail was whooping that ass.
translation.zh: 有流言说 科尔教训了他

translation.en: What's the first word you said?
translation.zh:
-你说的第一个词是什么？
-我觉得是 "教训了他"

translation.en: -I think it was "whooping that ass." -No, first word you said was "rumor."
translation.zh:
-你说的第一个词是什么？
-我觉得是 "教训了他" 不 你说的第一个词是"流言"

translation.en: Because that's what it was, Zeke. It's a rumor.
translation.zh:
因为那才是它的本质
齐克是个流言

translation.en: Ced, you walked in the gym the other day with a little nugget in the side of your eye.
translation.zh: 赛德 那天你进体育馆时 你的眼角肿了一小块包

translation.en: I fell down the steps, Mike! Okay? I got steps, my steps got a slope in them.
translation.zh: 我摔了一跤 好么 迈克尔？ 我下楼梯 踩在了自己脚上摔了

translation.en: You ever walked down a slope with dress shoes on?
translation.zh: 你穿过时装鞋下楼梯吗？

translation.en: Wait, so she kicked your ass, then you fell down the steps?
translation.zh:
等一下 所以她打了你
然后你摔下了楼梯？

translation.en: -See, now it makes perfect sense. -That's real funny.
translation.zh:
-看吧 现在完全合理了
-那真的很好笑

translation.en: Look at the white man trying to make light of the relationship issues...
translation.zh:
看看那个白人
把他自己的兄弟的情感关系问题 说得好像无足轻重似的

translation.en: -...of a brother. -It's not like that.
translation.zh: 并不是那样的

translation.en: No, it is like that. Let me tell you something, J.
translation.zh:
不 这就是那样的
我来给你说说吧

translation.en: Black people marched and died for the right to fight and treat each other like shit.
translation.zh:
黑人为了自己的合法权益一起抗争
一起游行示威 所以我们互相待对方如粪土那没关系

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -You did not march.
translation.zh:
-我的天啊
-你并没有游行示威

translation.en: You do not have that right. Neither do you, Bennett.
translation.zh:
所以你没那权力这么对我
你也一样 版纳德

translation.en: I saw it on TV. They show those marches a lot in February.
translation.zh:
我在电视上看过了
那些游行在二月份的时候经常播出的

translation.en: -Stop. -Your wife kicked your ass.
translation.zh:
住嘴 你老婆打了你 这真不是什么大事情
还有更糟的事

translation.en: It's really not that big of a deal.
translation.zh:
你老婆打了你 这真不是什么大事情
还有更糟的事

translation.en: -There's worse things. -It's my ex-wife. Okay?
translation.zh: 是我前妻打的 满意了？

translation.en: Y'all need to get in the habit of saying that. Ex-wife.
translation.zh:
你们所有人都需要养成说
"前妻"的习惯

translation.en: You know, it really kills me how y'all like to laugh at my pain.
translation.zh:
知道么 你们这样嘲笑我的痛楚
我是有多么地受伤

translation.en: I can't wait till y'all experience the shit I'm experiencing.
translation.zh:
我等不及看你们这群人
经历我现在所经历的了

translation.en: I say Rush Street, first round on Bennett.
translation.zh:
我说去蓝儿街
第一轮版纳德请客

translation.en: I'm supposed to have dinner with Kristen tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚应该和克里斯汀共进晚餐

translation.en: She'll understand, she's cool. I'll send her a text.
translation.zh:
她会理解的 她这人很好
我给她发短信说一声

translation.en: Welcome back, everybody.
translation.zh: 各位 欢迎回来

translation.en: We are still here with best-selling author Steve Harvey.
translation.zh:
我们依旧在这里与最畅销作家
史蒂夫哈维畅聊

translation.en: Well, what I try to get women to understand is that times have changed...
translation.zh: 我想要让女性明白的是 时代已经不同了

translation.en: ...but your playbook hasn't.
translation.zh: 但是你们的剧本却没有变

translation.en: I've gotten thousands of letters from all kinds of women...
translation.zh:
我收到了成千上万各种各样的
女性读者的来信

translation.en: ...who can't find a man, keep a man, or get what they want from their man.
translation.zh:
她们似乎不能找到真命天子
不能留住他们 或者从丈夫那里得不到自己想要的

translation.en: Until you understand how a man loves...
translation.zh: 你得了解一个男人如何爱

translation.en: ...how a man operates, how he thinks...
translation.zh:
一个男人如何运作
一个男人怎么思考

translation.en: ...until you get into the mindset of a man...
translation.zh: 你得了解一个男人的心思

translation.en: ...you will never win with us in the game of love.
translation.zh: 不然你就没办法在爱情中胜过我们

translation.en: Well, we certainly want to win with you in the game of love, Steve.
translation.zh:
没错 我们十分想要
在这场爱情游戏中赢过你 史蒂夫…

translation.en: -We have a question in the audience. -Hi, Steve.
translation.zh:
（宝贝 我可以跟他们一起出去吗？
回来给你带披萨） …我们的观众有个问题

translation.en: I've been living with my boyfriend for five years...
translation.zh:
嗨 史蒂夫
我和我的男朋友一起生活了五年了

translation.en: ...and he says that he loves me, and he's fully committed.
translation.zh: 他说他爱我 也是个乐于担当的人

translation.en: I guess what I want to know is how come he hasn't popped the question?
translation.zh: 我想知道的是他怎么还没有求婚

translation.en: He hasn't popped the question because you haven't required him to.
translation.zh:
他没那么做
是因为你并没有要求他那样做

translation.en: We'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我们马上回来

translation.en: RUSH STREET
translation.zh: （蓝儿街）

translation.en: -Can I get two beers? -Hey!
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I'm Cedric. Cedric, Cedric.
translation.zh: 我是塞德里克 塞德里克

translation.en: Yeah, I'm not married. That's why I'm not wearing a ring.
translation.zh: 我还没结婚 所以我也就没有戴婚戒

translation.en: I'm sorry, but Jesus has my heart.
translation.zh:
对不起
但是我的心已经皈依耶稣基督了

translation.en: Yeah, no, no, no, I get that. I love Jesus too.
translation.zh: 不 我明白了 我也信教的

translation.en: I talked to him today, I was like, "Jesus," I said, "I need a girl!"
translation.zh: 我今天和他谈过了 就像是 我说 "主啊 我需要个姑娘"

translation.en: And I get here and I see you, so I was like, "Thank you."
translation.zh:
然后我就到了这里 遇见了你
所以我就心想 "感谢您"

translation.en: You see Ced over there trying to pull that PYT?
translation.zh: 看见塞德在那边撩那美女了么

translation.en: Oh, she bad as hell.
translation.zh: 哦 她真的很热辣啊

translation.en: See, thinking like that, you lose the game before you even step in.
translation.zh:
你看 要是真这么想
你还没参战呢就已经输了

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -I'm gonna go on and leave.
translation.zh: 你们在聊些什么啊 我还是走算了

translation.en: She's crazy. And I don't like her knees.
translation.zh: 她疯了 而且我不喜欢他的膝盖

translation.en: Excuse me, Miss, I noticed that you were....
translation.zh: 打扰一下 小姐我注意到你

translation.en: Honestly, I couldn't care less about whatever it is you have to say.
translation.zh:
说实话 我根本不在乎
你到底想要说些什么

translation.en: And I can appreciate that.
translation.zh:
对此我十分感激
我只知道我好像之前在这里见过你

translation.en: I just know that I've seen you here before and you're usually so stunning....
translation.zh:
对此我十分感激
我只知道我好像之前在这里见过你 而你也会一直有这些

translation.en: And you'll always have those memories.
translation.zh: 美好回忆

translation.en: In fact, why don't you walk away and pretend this....
translation.zh:
事实上 为什么你就不滚开
然后装作…

translation.en: I don't know what I did to make you so defensive.
translation.zh: 我不明白我做了什么让你这样反感

translation.en: All I'm saying is, whatever it is, it's no reason to let yourself go, that's it.
translation.zh: 我想说的是 管它是什么 你不能够那样放纵你自己

translation.en: Let myself go?
translation.zh:
-就这样
-放纵我自己？

translation.en: I didn't mean any disrespect....
translation.zh: 我并没有不敬之意

translation.en: -Let me tell your tired ass something. -Something's changed.
translation.zh: 让我来给你个烦人的家伙说说清楚 一定是发生了什么事情

translation.en: Usually, there's an aura, there's a glint about you that I'm not seeing.
translation.zh:
我通常能看见
你身上有一种我从没见过的 光环与光芒在闪烁 可现在却没有了

translation.en: And I don't know if it's a relationship or if it's job related, it's just....
translation.zh: 我不知道这是否与一段关系 亦或是工作有关 还是…

translation.en: Is that it?
translation.zh: 是因为这个？

translation.en: It's work-related?
translation.zh: 与工作有关？

translation.en: Well, to be honest...
translation.zh: 好吧 说实话

translation.en: ...I was laid off from my job about two months ago.
translation.zh: 我…两个月前被请辞了

translation.en: -This damn economy. -How'd it go?
translation.zh: 这该死的经济形势 怎么会这样？

translation.en: Not good, man.
translation.zh: 不是很顺利 兄弟

translation.en: I literally have nothing to say anymore. I don't know what's going on.
translation.zh:
我真的是无话可说了
我不知道到底怎么了

translation.en: And my breath ain't right.
translation.zh: 我的口气貌似也不太好

translation.en: -Drink a beer. -You smell it?
translation.zh:
-喝杯啤酒吧
-你闻到了？

translation.en: You can't let that steal your smile, because that smile I'm talking about...
translation.zh:
你不能让这事夺去你的笑容
因为我所说的笑容

translation.en: ...that's gonna get you that next CEO gig, you get it?
translation.zh:
会给你带来下一个首席执行官职位
明白吗？

translation.en: See now? See? You're smiling.
translation.zh: 看见没 明白么 你在笑

translation.en: Now I'm smiling.
translation.zh: 然后我也跟着笑

translation.en: I'ma walk away from here like a fairy now, because I'm all happy.
translation.zh:
我会像一个神仙一样离开
因为我现在快乐似神仙

translation.en: -A fairy? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-一个神仙？
-没错

translation.en: -Have a good evening. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-晚上过得开心
-谢谢你

translation.en: Got shot down.
translation.zh: 你也给枪毙了

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等一等

translation.en: She calling him back for another episode of crazy.
translation.zh: 她叫他回去在演一出疯狂剧集

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 拿去

translation.en: She probably shot him down. Twice.
translation.zh: 她可能又要拒绝他 第二次了

translation.en: Crazy, right? Talking about Jesus and she don't speak English and stuff, right?
translation.zh:
她很疯狂对么？ 耶稣基督然后也不会说英语
之类的东西 对吧？

translation.en: Luck of mine. She actually gave me her damn number.
translation.zh:
我撞大运了
事实上她给了我她的电话

translation.en: The Dark Knight strikes again.
translation.zh: 黑暗骑士再次绝地反击

translation.en: How great is Kristen, man?
translation.zh:
-克里斯汀怎么样了啊 伙计
-很好

translation.en: -Nice. -She's a phenomenal girl.
translation.zh: 她是个非凡的女孩

translation.en: I just don't understand why she's with this dude.
translation.zh: 我只是不明白为什么她跟了这家伙

translation.en: -Nobody does. -How good is your credit?
translation.zh:
-没人明白
-你的信用等级多少了 伙计

translation.en: It's up. Low 400s, 430?
translation.zh:
涨了 大概400多
430？

translation.en: Goddamn! A 430? You can't even get a Discover Card!
translation.zh: 不是吧 才430？ 你大概连发现卡都申请不了吧

translation.en: Don't white people start off with a 500 credit score?
translation.zh:
白人不是要500
个信誉点才能办么？

translation.en: Five-fifty, 475 if you're a mulatto.
translation.zh:
是550 如果你是个黑白混血
只要475

translation.en: Cedric! Yes, Gail.
translation.zh:
-塞德里克
-什么事 科尔

translation.en: Gail, listen to what I'm trying to say! Gail, I don't care!
translation.zh:
科尔听听我想要说什么
科尔我才不在乎

translation.en: I don't care what you take out the garage! You can take the whole damn garage.
translation.zh: 我才不在乎你从车库里拿走了什么 你连整个车库都可以拿走

translation.en: Let me tell you something. Here's what I want, and this is what's-- Hello?
translation.zh:
让我来告诉你 什么是我想要的
这才是 你好？

translation.en: Gail?
translation.zh: 科尔？

translation.en: Y'all, I swear....
translation.zh: 你们 我发誓

translation.en: She didn't let me finish my sentence. I don't like that.
translation.zh:
她还没让我把话说完
我不喜欢她那样

translation.en: Hey, Ced. When's the divorce gonna be final?
translation.zh:
嘿 赛德
你的婚什么时候离完啊？

translation.en: Goodness, if I had to guess, I'd say like four weeks, 367 hours...
translation.zh:
天啊 如果要我猜

translation.en: Paint.

translation.en: -Okay. -And redecorate.
translation.zh:
-好
-然后重新装潢

translation.en: -Redecorate? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-重新装潢？
-是的

translation.en: I thought you loved that stuff. Why would you want to do that?
translation.zh:
我以为你喜欢那些东西
你为什么要重新装潢

translation.en: Because it looks like we live in a frat house, Jeremy.
translation.zh:
因为那让我们看起来好像
住在男生宿舍里 杰里米

translation.en: -Oh, stop it. -We are adults, for Christ's sakes.
translation.zh:
-哦 别那么说
-我们是成年人了 看在上帝的份上

translation.en: We make a decent living.
translation.zh:
-哦 别那么说
-我们是成年人了 看在上帝的份上 我们要过些得体的生活

translation.en: I think it's time to invest and make this a real home.
translation.zh:
我觉得是时候去投资
然后弄一个真正的家了

translation.en: With matching dishes and glasses...

translation.en: ...and a new couch.
translation.zh: 一个新沙发

translation.en: Well, what's wrong with my couch?

translation.en: Baby, you pulled it out of a dumpster.
translation.zh:
宝贝
你从一个垃圾堆里把它捡回来的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I'm pretty sure Annalisa was impregnated, like, right there.

我十分确信
安娜丽莎就是在那里受孕的

translation.en: It's got cigarette burns, bong spills, there was the scabies scare of '06.

那里有香烟的痕迹 烟斗洒了
那里有个1906年遗留的疥疮瘢痕

translation.en: -You're being dramatic. -No, I'm really not.
translation.zh:
-你太夸张了
-不 我真没有

translation.en: Your aunt who tinkles when she laughs?
translation.zh: 你有个大笑的时候会撒尿的姑姑

translation.en: She pissed all over the couch last Christmas.
translation.zh: 她在上个圣诞节尿了整个沙发

translation.en: It's disgusting. We're like animals.
translation.zh: 那非常地恶心 我们像是动物一样

translation.en: I cleaned up the bong spill and the cigarette burns.
translation.zh: 我把那些香烟痕迹清理掉了

translation.en: This couch has history.
translation.zh: 这沙发是有历史的

translation.en: And now it is history.
translation.zh: 现在 它要变成历史了

translation.en: So here are some new ideas.
translation.zh: 那么 这里有些新点子

translation.en: I thought we could look it over. Research some new styles.
translation.zh:
我觉得我们可以看看
搜索一下新的风格

translation.en: Gotta zero in on a color palette.
translation.zh:
把这像调色盘一样的屋子颜色
矫正一下

translation.en: I know you like mauve. You know?
translation.zh: 我知道你喜欢浅紫色 你知道吗？

translation.en: There was that period you went through, where you were partial to salmon.
translation.zh: 有一个时期 你打扮得像个鲑鱼一样

translation.en: Yeah, I'd rather watch Letters to Juliet with you again.
translation.zh:
是吗 我宁愿再跟你看一遍
写给朱丽叶的信

translation.en: I know you would. Because you cried at the end when they got reunited.
translation.zh:
我就知道你会这样想
因为你在他们重逢的时候哭出来了

translation.en: I wasn't crying, okay?
translation.zh: 我没有哭 好吗？

translation.en: I was having an allergic reaction to the perfume in the theater.
translation.zh: 我只是对那个电影院的香味过敏

translation.en: You bought the soundtrack. It's a good soundtrack.
translation.zh:
-你买了电影原声带
-那可是个质量很好的原声带

translation.en: Look, I'm really bad at this. Okay?
translation.zh: 听着 我对这非常不在行

translation.en: Please, can you do this?
translation.zh: 求你了 你可以做这些吗？

translation.en: -Without me? -Really?
translation.zh:
-不跟我一起
-真的吗？

translation.en: -Really. -By myself?
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-就我一个？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -I trust you. -Awesome.
translation.zh:
-我相信你
-非常好

translation.en: Okay, let me ask you a question.
translation.zh: 好吧 我要问你个问题

translation.en: Where is the last guy that you slept with in less than 90 days?
translation.zh:
近90天里
你上一个睡过的男人 在哪儿？

translation.en: You mean John? Hey! Baby!
translation.zh:
-你是说约翰？
-嘿 宝贝！

translation.en: What's up, girl?
translation.zh: 怎么样了 女孩？

translation.en: Hey, I had a great time the other night.
translation.zh: 听着 那天晚上我过得很愉快

translation.en: -Oh, did you, Alex? -Yeah, Melanie. I was gonna call you...
translation.zh:
-是吗 亚历克斯？
-梅兰妮 是的 我正要给你打电话

translation.en: Melanie? It's Mya, negro.
translation.zh: 梅兰妮 我叫玛雅！你这个黑鬼

translation.en: Yeah. I gotta go. So I'll call you.
translation.zh: 哦 我得走了 那么我会给你电话的

translation.en: I know you did not just call her Melanie.
translation.zh: 我知道你不止叫她一个人梅拉妮

translation.en: It's okay. I'm not even gonna let him get to me.
translation.zh:
那挺好的
我不会让他影响到 我心情的

translation.en: I am in a better place and I am on another level.
translation.zh:
我比他强 而且现在
我已经到了另一个层面了

translation.en: "The Player" vs. "The 90 Day Rule Girl"
translation.zh:
（“花花公子”
对战 “原则女”）

translation.en: I don't know, Sonia. I feel like I have x-ray vision.
translation.zh:
我不知道索尼娅
我感觉我像是有了点Ｘ光透视眼

translation.en: Like, man goggles.
translation.zh: 就好像有了筛选男人的法眼

translation.en: We spend all this time complaining...
translation.zh: 我们花费了那么多时间用来抱怨

translation.en: ...about how guys don't want to be in relationships...
translation.zh:
男人是多么的不愿意
有一段稳定的恋情

translation.en: ...they just want to hook up.
translation.zh: 他们只喜欢一夜情

translation.en: But really, all along, we've had the power.
translation.zh: 但实际上 我们一直都占有主动权

translation.en: Right. We have?
translation.zh: 是的 我们占有主动权吗？

translation.en: Yes! We control the cookie.
translation.zh: 当然 我们把握着甜心饼干

translation.en: She who controls the cookie controls the game.
translation.zh:
把握住甜心饼干的人
才能掌控整个游戏

translation.en: Okay, I got it. What's the cookie?
translation.zh:
好吧 我懂了
什么是甜心饼干？

translation.en: -It's a metaphor. -For what?
translation.zh:
-那只是比喻
-比喻什么的

translation.en: For....
translation.zh: 那个…

translation.en: -Yes. The cookie! -The cookie!
translation.zh:
-对了 甜心饼干
-甜心饼干

translation.en: I got it. The cookie!
translation.zh: 我终于懂了 甜心饼干

translation.en: I'm telling you, the power's in the cookie.
translation.zh:
我告诉你吧
力量就在甜心饼干里

translation.en: So how do we control the cookie?
translation.zh:
那么
我们怎么才能控制住甜心饼干

translation.en: By putting it in the cookie jar...
translation.zh: 通过把甜心饼干放到饼干罐里

translation.en: ...clasping the lid on tight, and leaving it in there. Okay.
translation.zh:
-拧紧盖子 就把它放在那儿
-好的

translation.en: Until some little boy actually grows up and earns it.
translation.zh:
直到这些小男孩们
足够成熟到可以赢得它

translation.en: I get it.
translation.zh:
我懂了 就好像我的一个表妹
有一个五次约会规则

translation.en: It's kind of like when my cousin had the five-date rule. It was similar to that.
translation.zh:
我懂了 就好像我的一个表妹
有一个五次约会规则 这两者挺像的

translation.en: Oh, no. That's child's play. I'm thinking something a little bit more radical.

哦不 那只是小儿科
我想要更极端点

translation.en: See, this is why you need to get the book, because it has a whole chapter on it.
translation.zh:
看吧 这就是为什么你需要这本书 因为这里有关于
这事情的整整一个章节

translation.en: "Getting The Respect That You Deserve: The 90-Day Rule."
translation.zh: 得到你应得的尊重 90天规则

translation.en: Are you high?
translation.zh: 你疯了么？

translation.en: -No. -Who is waiting 90 days?
translation.zh:
-没有
-谁会等待90天？

translation.en: If it's good enough for the Fortune 500 company...
translation.zh: 如果这规则适用于世界500强公司

translation.en: ...it's good enough for me.
translation.zh: 那么它就适用于我

translation.en: See, when I worked at Ford Motor Company...
translation.zh: 当我为福特公司工作的时候

translation.en: ...there was a 90-day probation rule.
translation.zh: 他们有个90天试用期的规定

translation.en: I had to be on the job for 90 days before they gave me a benefit package.
translation.zh:
在他们给我福利待遇之前
我需要在这个工作岗位做90天

translation.en: Ford figured this, "Let's see how he performs.
translation.zh:
福特的意思是
让我们看看他是怎么表现的

translation.en: "If he comes in on time, if he proves himself, then we'll give him benefits."
translation.zh:
如果他证明了他自己
我们就会给他福利待遇

translation.en: So if Ford Motor Company waits 90 days to pass out their benefit package...

所以如果福特公司都能在
分发福利之前等待90天的话

translation.en: ...why won't women wait?

translation.en: You see, that's our problem.
translation.zh: 看吧 那是我们自己的问题

translation.en: It's that we keep giving it away to some Axe body spray wearing man-ho...

问题就在于我们一直被那拥有

translation.en: ...who thinks my name's Melanie.
translation.zh: 他甚至以为我的名字是梅兰妮

translation.en: But it doesn't matter, because a girl's got needs.

但是那不重要
因为女人也有需要啊

translation.en: Listen to yourself. Do you really think you could wait 90 days?
translation.zh:
听听你自己说的
你真的以为你能忍90天？

translation.en: Yes. I spent six months dreaming about a guy...

translation.en: ...that I met once at a wedding weekend.
translation.zh: 梦想着一个只在婚礼周末见到的男人

translation.en: The one you had sex with at the beach?

translation.en: Yes, who never called.
translation.zh: 是的 他之后再也没有打来电话

translation.en: Yeah, so, I definitely think I could do 90 days.
translation.zh:
是的 所以
我非常确定我能等待90天

translation.en: Matter of fact, I could do 90 days before 90 days.
translation.zh:
实际上
我能在90天之后再等90天

translation.en: I am so sick and tired of men. Maybe I should start dating women.

translation.en: My God, I'll give you 50 bucks if you guys kiss.

天啊 如果你们俩接吻
我会付你50美金

translation.en: -But there has to be tongue. -Boy, get out of here!

-不过必须是舌吻
-臭小子 滚开

translation.en: Gave it a shot.

translation.en: What is wrong with the men of this generation? Like, what?

这一代的男人到底是怎么了
说真的怎么了

translation.en: I ask myself that same question every day.

translation.en: Whatever happened to respect for women?

translation.en: Whatever happened to decorum?

translation.en: May I have the honor of buying you two lovely ladies a drink?

我能有幸为你们两位
可爱的女士买杯喝的吗？

translation.en: Absolutely. And thank you for asking.

-我们想要
-为什么

translation.en: Is it that you crave scintillating conversation?

是因为你渴望一场

还是你想要讨论一下政治

translation.en: You know, I don't really discuss politics on the first encounter.

你知道 第一次见面
我通常不会讨论政治

translation.en: -And neither do we. This is why I'm-- -Oh, no, I know what it is.

-我们也不会 这就是为什么我
-哦不 我知道了

translation.en: It's the visual thing, right?

translation.en: You saw me, you sexualized me, you wanted to get into my pants?
translation.zh:
你看到了我 对我产生了性趣
想进入到我裤子里面

translation.en: Absolutely not.
translation.zh:
-绝对不是的
-是吗 那么 又是什么呢？

translation.en: Yeah, but then, what is it? Because, you know, you don't know me.
translation.zh:
-绝对不是的
-是吗 那么 又是什么呢？ 因为 你知道的 你不认识我

translation.en: I could be a psycho.

translation.en: I could be a serial killer. I could have 16 personalities.

我可能是个连环杀手
我可能有16种人格

translation.en: -Let me get a Crown and Coke. -Got you covered.

-给我一杯皇冠可乐
-正在做

translation.en: And 16 of whatever she's having?

translation.en: My name is Zeke.

translation.en: Mya.
translation.zh: 我叫玛雅

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Mya.

translation.en: Day one, 89 more to go.
translation.zh: 这是第一天 还有89天呢

translation.en: Order for table 16!
translation.zh: 给16桌的菜

translation.en: Dominic. Valet's slammed. Go park some cars.

多米尼克泊车员撞车了
你去外面帮着停车

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你
-谢谢

translation.en: Hey, that's my car!
translation.zh: 喂 那是我的车

translation.en: Who says you have to compromise?
translation.zh: 谁说你需要将就

translation.en: Okay, where's the window?

translation.en: Window. Window, window.
translation.zh: 车窗

translation.en: Not the final destination.
translation.zh: 这不是终点

translation.en: Door open.
translation.zh: 开门

translation.en: Shit.

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: If I didn't know any better, I'd think you were following me.

translation.en: No, just....
translation.zh: 没有 我只是

translation.en: Just out for a drive, that's all.
translation.zh: 我只是兜兜风 就这样

translation.en: Have a safe drive.
translation.zh: 那你悠着点

translation.en: Well, wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: You changed your mind?
translation.zh: 改变主意了

translation.en: You think I could take you to dinner sometime?
translation.zh: 改天我能请你吃饭吗

translation.en: How's tomorrow night?
translation.zh: 明天晚上如何呢？

translation.en: We love the fact that you're a strong, confident woman with a fabulous job...
translation.zh:
听着 我们乐意接受这个现实
你是个强大自信事业有成的女人

translation.en: ...but we're men.
translation.zh:
听着 我们乐意接受这个现实
你是个强大自信事业有成的女人 可是我们是男生

translation.en: Our DNA is encoded to be the provider.

translation.en: And if you don't ever let us feel like we're in control and necessary...
translation.zh: 如果你从没让我们觉得我们处于上风

translation.en: ...we're just not about to profess our love to you.
translation.zh: 我们不会公然表达我们的爱的

translation.en: I mean, we'll just find us a woman who actually makes us feel like a man.
translation.zh:
我意思是 我们只是想找个
小鸟依人女人让我们觉得自己够男人

translation.en: Yeah, a ho.
translation.zh: 是啊 像是找个小姐

translation.en: We're kind of like dogs, see, you pet us, we'll be loyal to you forever.
translation.zh: 我们像狗 你想 你宠爱我们 我们就会永远忠诚

translation.en: Yeah, dogs. There you go, Steve.
translation.zh: 是啊 狗 就是这样 史蒂夫

translation.en: I don't need that book.
translation.zh: 我不需要这本书

translation.en: Oh, yes! Yeah!
translation.zh: 太棒了！耶！

translation.en: Oh, honey. Jennifer's coming over tonight to babysit.
translation.zh: 哦 亲爱的 珍妮弗今晚会照顾你

translation.en: You're going to bingo with Grandma?
translation.zh: 你要和奶奶玩填格子游戏吗？

translation.en: -No, actually. I have a date. -Really?
translation.zh:
-不是啊 我有约会
-真的吗？

translation.en: With a man or a woman?
translation.zh: 和男人还是女人啊？

translation.en: A man! Duke, why would you even ask me that?
translation.zh:
男人啊
干吗还问我这个？

translation.en: Because I overheard Grandma say that she was beginning to wonder.
translation.zh: 我偷听到奶奶说她也许开始困惑了

translation.en: You know I'm cool either way.
translation.zh: 要知道你喜欢是男是女我都行啊

translation.en: Yo, sorry I'm late.
translation.zh: 不好意思我迟到了

translation.en: -Yo, Bennett, get in the game, let's go. -What's up, man?
translation.zh:
-版纳德加入我们的游戏 来吧！
-怎么了伙计？

translation.en: I had the best night of my entire life last night.
translation.zh: 昨天我度过了人生中最棒的一晚

translation.en: -Is that right? -Unbelievable.
translation.zh:
-真的么？
-难以置信

translation.en: -Check ball. -I thought you got fired last night.
translation.zh:
-回止球
-你昨晚被烧了吧

translation.en: That's all right. I'll make twice as much catering.
translation.zh:
好吧 我会打双份工的 -好吧 回止球
-希望她是值得的

translation.en: -All right. Play ball. -Hope she's worth it.
translation.zh:
-好吧 回止球
-希望她是值得的

translation.en: What you gonna do with that? What you gonna do with that?
translation.zh:
-你要对它做什么
-你要对它做什么

translation.en: Count it!
translation.zh: 计分啊 从背后突击

translation.en: Over the back!
translation.zh: 从背后突击

translation.en: See, I'm taking her to The Lounge.
translation.zh: 我带她去休息室了

translation.en: Maurice hooked me up with a private room...
translation.zh: 莫里斯给我找了间包房

translation.en: ...and all I gotta pay for is wine and a fat tip.
translation.zh: 我只要付酒钱和优厚的小费

translation.en: Nice. So you gonna be escorting her in that 2005 Honda Civic...
translation.zh:
不错 所以你要开着
没有保险杠的本田思域2005

translation.en: ...with the missing bumper or that $155,000 car she think you drive?
translation.zh:
不错 所以你要开着
没有保险杠的本田思域2005 还是155,000
美元的豪车护送她

translation.en: I'm just gonna level with her, I guess.
translation.zh: 我想我该坦白

translation.en: And tell her what? That you an unemployed prep cook?
translation.zh: 坦白什么 你是给厨师打下手的吗？

translation.en: Zeke, unemployed Culinary Institute graduate. We talked about this.
translation.zh:
齐克待业烹调师
在校研究生我们就这样说

translation.en: -Yes, that's not my point. -That's stupid.
translation.zh:
-我没那个意思
-这方法太次了

translation.en: That's dumb, Dom. You trying to get some, you gonna have to lie.
translation.zh:
这是下策 多米
但你要得到她 你就必须说谎

translation.en: Listen, one time I told Gail I just won the lottery.
translation.zh: 有一次我对科尔说我中了乐透

translation.en: I need some gas money so I can go redeem the ticket. She gave me $20.
translation.zh:
我需要些钱
我才能兑换彩票她给了我20美元

translation.en: Don't lie to her.
translation.zh: 别欺骗她

translation.en: I don't want to lie to her.
translation.zh: 我不想骗她

translation.en: Okay, hold up. You don't have to lie. You omit.
translation.zh:
好的 等等 你无须撒谎
只要适当忽略就好

translation.en: Just, no, no, you omit.
translation.zh: 你只要…不 你忽略就好

translation.en: You just tell her you're a high-end chef that's in between gigs.
translation.zh: 你就说你是个杰出却不得志的厨师 这是在演出的之间

translation.en: Your car's in the shop.
translation.zh: 你车泊在店里

translation.en: No, not like that. No, it is. It is like that. How old is she?

translation.en: I come in the house, she's like, "You want to eat?" I said, "Eat what?"

我进屋时 她问“你想吃点什么吗”
我说“吃什么”

translation.en: Yo, first of all, put my plate down and stop hitting on my mom, man.

嘿 首先 把我的 盘子放下
还有别再勾引我妈了 兄弟

translation.en: Don't get mad at me! I don't even wanna be here.

是你们要来的
我想去脱衣舞俱乐部！

哥们儿 快点搞定 我还有一堆一美元呢
得把它们用出去

你们这些家伙要完蛋了 而且说实话
你们也只能坐以待毙

translation.en: Yeah, but they don't know that we know that they know our maneuvers.

没错 可是她们不知道
我们知道她们知道我们的行动

你知道我为什么不跟杰里米
单独出去了吧？

兄弟们
这就像爱国者队的比尔比利克 把喷射队的战术给偷走了一样

translation.en: -Right, and they got busted. -Yeah, but they won the game.

-是啊 然后他们被整得够呛

我们用史蒂夫哈维的话

translation.en: We pretend to give them what they want so we get what we want.

translation.en: We lie to them.

translation.en: Michael, I need to get something off my chest.

你知道吗？

translation.en: And my mom just started relying on me for so many things. Too many things.

而我妈妈就开始依赖我做很多事
太多事了

-我猜这就是我们如此亲密的原因

这就好像参加考试
而你已经知道答案

我会把你放在首位 卡丹 -好吗？

translation.en: Yeah.

-好吗？
-好

translation.en: All right. Now, you said you wanted to talk about something.

translation.en: Did I?

女人们没有任何胜算
她们已成瓮中之鳖

我刚刚更新了我的简历
投到了威软公司

translation.en: Really? You're serious?
translation.zh:
真的？
你是认真的吗？

我看中了广告周刊上的
一个招聘职位 然后我想

为什么不试试呢 杰里米
你已经没有什么好失去的了

宝贝 这太棒了 真的很棒
我真为你自豪

-哦我的天

八字还没一撇呢
可能都不会叫我去参加面试

杰里米 你在帕金斯设计学院时是

不 你是个很棒的艺术家

-你知道我刚刚在想什么吗？

是啊

而我就是那个

不过那是一段他得

-该死
-伙计

兄弟你别提醒我自己说了什么

translation.en: Yeah.

好啦 齐克 反正他又不是

他只是想要给自己的新专辑

可我就是很喜欢嘛
所以他就决定要听听看了

translation.en: Zeke!

translation.en: Super Freak Zeke! What up, baby?

老天啊 宝贝儿 这就是齐克

嗨 你好啊 克里斯特
很高兴认识你

translation.en: Now, ladies, if a man simply introduces you as his friend...

translation.zh: 怎么了 宝贝儿出什么事了？

translation.en: Your work just called.
translation.zh: 刚刚有公事电话找你

translation.en: And I thought it might be an emergency, so I picked up.
translation.zh: 然后我以为是什么紧急事件 就替你接了

translation.en: But it was just your mom.
translation.zh: 只不过那其实是你妈

translation.en: Really? You know, the T-Mobile Top Five be acting up--
translation.zh:
怎么会你知道电话公司
老是会串线什么的嘛…

translation.en: Don't bullshit me, Michael.
translation.zh: 别和我瞎扯迈克尔

translation.en: Baby, listen, I know how that looks, but trust me, this isn't--
translation.zh:
宝贝你听我说 我知道这看上去很糟
可你要信任我 这不是…

translation.en: Trust? I believed you.
translation.zh: 信任 我相信过你

translation.en: I can't compete with your mother. And I won't.
translation.zh:
只不过我没办法和你妈相比
我也不愿意那么做

translation.en: You don't have to--
translation.zh: 你不用和她…

translation.en: Then why did you look me in my face and lie?
translation.zh: 那你为什么可以当着我的面说谎？

translation.en: You need to go.
translation.zh: 你得走了

translation.en: Baby, listen I--
translation.zh: 宝贝 你听我说

translation.en: Get out of my face, Michael.
translation.zh: 快给我离开 迈克尔

translation.en: And Candace wasn't the only one who was all business that day.
translation.zh:
而康蒂丝也不是
那天唯一把事情说清楚的一个 美人儿你好

translation.en: -Hi. -How are you?
translation.zh:
-嘿
-你好吗？

translation.en: -I have a 2:00, so-- -You look stunning.
translation.zh:
-我2点还约了人 所以…
-你看上去美极了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: So you said you had some news?
translation.zh: 你要和我说什么事？

translation.en: Yeah. My investor friend that I told you about?
translation.zh:
对 记得我和你说过
我有一个做投资人的朋友吗？

translation.en: Read your prospectus, loves it, and wants you to give him a call.
translation.zh:
他看了你的计划书 很喜欢
然后想让你给他个电话

translation.en: You serious?
translation.zh: 你说真的？

translation.en: I told you it was brilliant.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过那份计划书很棒了

translation.en: Thank you, thank you, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 谢谢

translation.en: Okay, we gotta go celebrate. Let's go out tonight.
translation.zh: 好啊 我们要去庆祝 今晚就出去吧

translation.en: I'm not free tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚有事情

translation.en: Okay, well, what about tomorrow night, then?
translation.zh: 没事啊 那明晚怎么样？

translation.en: Dominic, I'm gonna hit you with the headline, okay?
translation.zh: 多米 我就和你直说了好吗？

translation.en: I recently reconnected with an ex-boyfriend of mine from college.
translation.zh:
我最近和我大学里的前男友
重新联络上了

translation.en: Anyway, he just got a divorce and is moving back to L.A. and I--
translation.zh: 他刚离婚然后准备搬回来 所以我…

translation.en: You breaking up with me?
translation.zh: 所以你要和我分手

translation.en: No! No, I'm not breaking up, just taking a break.
translation.zh: 不是 不是分手 就是暂停一下

translation.en: -I need some space. -Space.
translation.zh:
-我需要一些空间
-空间

translation.en: -Yeah, because we were moving too fast-- -Yeah, you sound like a guy.
translation.zh:
-是啊 因为我们进展得太快了
-是啊 你听上去就像个男人

translation.en: What did you say?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: I said you sound like a guy.
translation.zh: 我说你的口气像个男人

translation.en: Is that why you invited me to this place? For a business lunch?
translation.zh: 所以你才和我约在这里谈是么？ 就像公务会餐一样？

translation.en: So you can have an out-time? Dominic, look, I really like you.
translation.zh:
-然后就可以和我暂停一下
-听着多米 我真的很喜欢你

translation.en: Okay? I didn't want to string you along. Let's just be friends.
translation.zh:
好吗？ 我不想一直拖住你
我们还是做朋友吧

translation.en: Yeah, I don't really need any more friends, Lauren.
translation.zh: 是吗 可我不是很需要更多朋友劳伦

translation.en: You know, and I really don't need your friends to let me down easy.
translation.zh:
其实吧 我真的不需要
你朋友给我行什么方便

translation.en: Okay, don't be stupid, Dominic. That's business, not personal.
translation.zh:
多米尼克别犯傻 生意归生意
你别感情用事

translation.en: Do you even know the difference?
translation.zh: 那你知道它们的区别吗？

translation.en: You know, Lauren, I--
translation.zh: 知道吗 劳伦 我…

translation.en: I never even had a prospectus, you know? I did it all to impress you.
translation.zh:
我以前甚至都没有做过计划书
这种东西 你知道吗
我做的那些事情都是为了你

translation.en: You inspired me, you motivated me to do something for myself for the first time.
translation.zh: 是你激励了我鼓舞了我 让我第一次想要自己动手去努力做事

translation.en: And all this time, I thought you were too good for me.
translation.zh:
一直以来我还以为是你太优秀
我配不上呢

translation.en: Kris? Picked up some pizza.
translation.zh: 克里斯 在家吗 我带了点批萨回来

translation.en: What I don't get is just like the book, I was the guy with potential.
translation.zh: 我不明白的是就像那书里说的那样

translation.en: I told her the truth, I put myself out there, and it still wasn't enough.
translation.zh:
我是个潜力股 还和她开诚布公坦白了一切
这还不够么

translation.en: At least you didn't get caught in a flat-out lie.
translation.zh:
至少你没有撒了个弥天大谎
还给戳穿了

translation.en: Y'all should see how bad things are with Candace right now.
translation.zh:
你们都该看看我现在
和卡丹之间有多糟糕

translation.en: Kristen wouldn't even look at me when I showed up at Gina's.
translation.zh:
我去吉娜家找克里斯汀的时候
她连正眼都不瞧我

translation.en: She'll change her mind.
translation.zh: 她会回心转意的

translation.en: Nah. You did not see the way she looked at me. Such--
translation.zh:
不会的 你那是没看见当时
她看着我的眼神 是那么的

translation.en: -Hate? -Hurt.
translation.zh:
-充满恨意
-是那么地受伤

translation.en: It's hate. Women will hate you fast.
translation.zh: 那是忿恨 女人总是恨你更多一点

translation.en: Either way, fellas. I think we brought this upon ourselves.
translation.zh:
不管怎样 伙计们
我觉得这是我们自找的

translation.en: It was self-defense. They attacked first! We had to strike back.
translation.zh:
那是正当防卫好么 -是她们先出招的 我们得回击啊
-没错

translation.en: We were just protecting our natural-born right to be men. Am I right?
translation.zh:
我们只是在捍卫自己
与天俱来的男性权益不是吗？

translation.en: -Right. -Right.
translation.zh:
-对头
-对

translation.en: Love us or leave us, right?
translation.zh: 不够爱我们就走人嘛 是吧？

translation.en: Right!
translation.zh: 就是

translation.en: And they left us.
translation.zh: 所以她们就抛弃我们了

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -We're back. -Take all the time you need.
translation.zh:
-我们又来啦
-随便看多久都行

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Zeke, check it out.
translation.zh: 齐克 快看

translation.en: Your right. My left.
translation.zh: 你右边我左边

translation.en: Not my type.
translation.zh: 不是我的菜

translation.en: That's how we do it, Zeke. I line them up, you mow them down.
translation.zh:
我们一直这么做的啊 齐克
替你整好队形 你全部搞定啊

translation.en: Can I have my tab?
translation.zh: 还是把账单给我吧

translation.en: -You can only get it once a year. -What kind of meat is in the McRib?
translation.zh:
一年才能吃到一次
这麦肋排到底是什么肉啊

translation.en: -Fellas. -Let me guess...
translation.zh:
兄弟们
我来猜猜

translation.en: ...school pictures?
translation.zh: 学校照相日

translation.en: You look like a substitute teacher.
translation.zh: 你看上去像个代课老师

translation.en: I finally sent my résumé over to Neversoft. I had my meeting today.
translation.zh: 我终于还是把简历投给了威软公司 今天去面试过了

translation.en: And they just called. I got the job.
translation.zh:
刚才他们打电话给我
我拿到那份工作了

translation.en: -Is that right? -Congratulations, man!
translation.zh:
-真的？
-恭喜啊 兄弟

translation.en: I'm a senior designer at Neversoft. With full benefits.
translation.zh:
我现在是那里的高级设计师了
有全套福利呢

translation.en: Damn right, and the next step is the expense card.
translation.zh:
这就对了
下一步就是要办好消费卡

translation.en: I gotta call Kris.
translation.zh: 我要打给克里斯汀

translation.en: She not talking to you, huh?
translation.zh: 她还是不和你说话吗？

translation.en: -No. -Well, you should call her anyway.
translation.zh:
-是啊
-可你总得要打给她的

translation.en: She's the reason it happened, right?
translation.zh: 没有她你不会去找工作 不是么？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh:
-是啊
-这建议真不错

translation.en: That's good advice, right there. How's that project going along?
translation.zh:
-是啊
-这建议真不错 你的那个计划进行得怎么样了

translation.en: It's going great. In fact...
translation.zh:
进展得一切顺利
事实上 我就要走了

translation.en: ...I'm gonna have to get out of here soon and go get some work done.
translation.zh:
进展得一切顺利
事实上 我就要走了 然后去把一些活儿干完

translation.en: You know what we should do? We should celebrate, right?
translation.zh:
知道我们在该干吗吗？
我们应该要庆祝一下是吧

translation.en: -Nice. Yes. -New job, first round's on Michael.
translation.zh:
-好棒啊 知道啊
-迈克尔的第一个工作

translation.en: -Yes. I like that. -No, no. I just had the last round--
translation.zh:
-好 我同意
-不要 我刚刚请了上一轮

translation.en: -This is nice, just the fellas. -Just like old times.
translation.zh:
-这样很好啊 就我们兄弟几个
-就好像以前的美好时光

translation.en: No, it's not like old times because I don't have a curfew this time.
translation.zh:
才不像以前呢
因为现在我没有宵禁时间啦

translation.en: Speaking of curfew, I gotta go. My night to cook.
translation.zh:
说到回家时间 我得走了
今天该我做晚饭了

translation.en: Bennett, you sound like a bitch.
translation.zh: 版纳德 你怎么像个娘们儿

translation.en: We just got finished hearing good news, we with the fellas, we drinking.
translation.zh:
我们这不刚听到这么多好消息么
和兄弟们在一起喝一杯多好

translation.en: He running home all henpecked. Come on, man!
translation.zh:
可他却妻管严似的飞奔回家
别这样啊 兄弟

translation.en: I'm not cooking because I have to, I'm cooking because I want to, that's my wife.
translation.zh: 我不是因为没办法必须才煮饭 我是自己想做饭 给我太太吃啊

translation.en: Come on, now, Bennett.
translation.zh: 我说 版纳德

translation.en: I'm not saying it like that, I'm saying just, right now--
translation.zh:
我不是…我不是那个意思
我就是说现在这会儿

translation.en: Don't be mad at me because I got a wife at the house.
translation.zh: 别因为我家里有老婆等着就生我气嘛

translation.en: That means sometimes I can't hang out all night with you guys.
translation.zh:
即使那意味着
我不能整晚和你们一起混

translation.en: I gotta go home early then that's what I gotta do.
translation.zh: 我得早回家去 可我愿意那样

translation.en: I'm just saying.
translation.zh: 我就这么一说

translation.en: I got this round.
translation.zh: 这轮我请吧

translation.en: -I'm happy for you, congratulations. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-恭喜兄弟 真为你高兴
-谢啦

translation.en: -I'll see you guys. -Big B!
translation.zh:
-回见了各位
-再见了大块头

translation.en: You're $20 short, Bennett.
translation.zh: 少给了20呢 版纳德

translation.en: Yeah, no, I used to cook for Gail on Thursdays. That was my day.
translation.zh:
我以前每周四都会给卡尔下厨
那是我的料理日

translation.en: I'm happy we're free. I really am.
translation.zh: 我很高兴我们都是自由身 真心高兴

translation.en: I'm telling you right now, we're better off without them.
translation.zh: 告诉你们吧 没有她们我们过得更好

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, who needs to put up with their shit?
translation.zh: 是啊 谁愿意老是受她们的气啊

translation.en: And their demands, the nagging--
translation.zh: 各种要求 各种唠叨

translation.en: The expectations. Expectation is the catalyst for all of that.
translation.zh: 还有各种期待 而期望什么的就是一切麻烦的催化剂

translation.en: -Here we go. -You know what's funny?
translation.zh:
-来喝
-你们知道哪里才是最可笑的么？

translation.en: Gail used to love it when I cooked Bolognese sauce from scratch.
translation.zh: 卡尔以前最爱吃我自己做的意式肉酱

translation.en: Like, that was her favorite, so--
translation.zh: 那就像是她的最爱

translation.en: All right, boys, we are free to do whatever we want...
translation.zh:
好了 兄弟们
我们现在可以随心所欲了

translation.en: ...with whoever we want, whenever we want, all right? To freedom!
translation.zh:
想和谁一起在什么地方干些什么
都随我们了 敬自由一杯

translation.en: Freedom!
translation.zh: 敬自由一杯

translation.en: Ced, lift your glass, man, get involved.
translation.zh: 赛德 举杯啊 要跟上组织

translation.en: -Right, I'm sorry. No, no, no. -Take that shot, baby.
translation.zh:
对对 不好意思啊 抱歉
把你那杯喝了

translation.en: To freedom.
translation.zh: 敬自由一杯

translation.en: Bottoms up.
translation.zh: 干了

translation.en: Don't need them.
translation.zh: 才不需要她们呢

translation.en: I gotta piss.
translation.zh: 我要上小号去

translation.en: I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 马上回来

translation.en: Look like you gotta take a dump, the way you moving.
translation.zh: 你看上去怎么像是要去上大号呢

translation.en: What? Gail, ain't nobody calling to fight with you right now.
translation.zh:
-又怎么了？
-卡尔 我不是打来和你吵架的

translation.en: -What the hell do-- -Look! I'm coming home.
translation.zh:
-那你他妈…
-听着听着 我要回家来

translation.en: Really, Cedric?
translation.zh: 真的假的 赛德？

translation.en: Gail, let me tell you something. That's my house too, Gail!
translation.zh:
盖儿 我告诉你吧 那也是我的家
那房子的水电账单都是我付的好嘛

translation.en: I pay the bills in that house! It's my house too. I'm coming home.
translation.zh:
盖儿 我告诉你吧 那也是我的家
那房子的水电账单都是我付的好嘛 那也是我的家 我要回家来了

translation.en: Which is where I belong, girl.
translation.zh: 那也是我的心之所属啊宝贝

translation.en: Gail, I'm tired of this tough shit. I miss you, Gail.
translation.zh:
卡尔 我受够了这些倒霉事了
我想你了 卡尔

translation.en: Gail, I ain't been the same, man.
translation.zh:
盖儿
我都折腾得和以前不是一个人形了

translation.en: I'm out here, I'm out here on these streets and shit.
translation.zh:
我混在外面
老是晃在外面无事生事

translation.en: I'm out here in the strip clubs.
translation.zh: 我还混去了脱衣舞俱乐部

translation.en: These girls calling me by my first name, like, I'm there every day!
translation.zh: 那里的姑娘都直呼我的名字 搞得好像我天天泡在那里似的

translation.en: Which I am, but that's because I'm going through something, Gail.
translation.zh:
虽然我的确是啦 可那也是因为我正在困难时期嘛
卡尔

translation.en: I need to be held. I need you to rub my back. Put me in my onesie.
translation.zh:
我需要有人支撑 我想要你给我揉背
给我穿上连体睡衣

translation.en: I changed, I need my woman back!
translation.zh:
我改好了
我想要重回自家女人的怀抱

translation.en: I'm around all these men and shit!
translation.zh:
我受够老和一群臭男人
还有一堆破事在一起了

translation.en: I don't want it. I don't want that life no more, I want you and Jesus.
translation.zh:
我受够老和一群臭男人
还有一堆破事在一起了 我再也不想要过那种生活了
我只想要你还有老天

translation.en: -And that's it. -Okay, Big Daddy.
translation.zh:
-就足够了
-好吧 大乖乖

translation.en: What you say?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: How soon can you get here?
translation.zh: 你多久才能到家？

translation.en: Like-- Like 20, 22, 23 minutes.
translation.zh:
大概 也就20  22
或者23分钟吧

translation.en: Bring your sexy ass home. I'll be waiting.
translation.zh:
那你就快给我风骚的扭回家吧 -等你哦
-要我顺路捎点什么东西么？

translation.en: You want me to bring you something? You want some Doritos, or something?
translation.zh:
-等你哦
-要我顺路捎点什么东西么？ 你要不要带点薯片或者别的什么？

translation.en: Because I can stop and get it, baby. Whatever makes you happy.
translation.zh:
没关系我可以顺路给你买的宝贝
只要你开心就好

translation.en: -Just come home. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-你回家就好
-那好

translation.en: All right, I love you.
translation.zh: 好的 我爱你

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢您

translation.en: Yup.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Good shit, brother. Go home to Gail.
translation.zh: 太好了兄弟 快回家找卡尔去吧

translation.en: He just wipe shit on my back?
translation.zh: 是不是把屎擦我背上了？

translation.en: You didn't even wash your hands, man?
translation.zh: 都不知道便后要洗手的吗 兄弟？

translation.en: Who the hell shits with a hat on, anyway?
translation.zh: 你那帽子算他妈的是什么玩意儿嘛

translation.en: -She said she was coming from Shanghai. -I remember her.
translation.zh:
她说她是从上海回来的
我记得她

translation.en: Fellas, I will see you later.
translation.zh: 弟兄们 回见了

translation.en: Let's all cash out, we'll go together. You going to the Ass Factory, right?
translation.zh:
那我们都结账走吧 大家一起走
你是要去美臀工厂对吧？

translation.en: Gail is taking me back, I'm going home.
translation.zh: 卡尔允许我回去了 哥我要回家了

translation.en: Home!
translation.zh: 回家！

translation.en: Girl, I am married. Please!
translation.zh: 姑娘 人家是已婚人士好么 拜托

translation.en: Thank you. Married man!
translation.zh: 谢谢您了 已婚人士

translation.en: That night, we all realized that the plots...
translation.zh: 那一晚 我们都明白了所有的

translation.en: ...plans and schemes couldn't compare to one simple thing, the truth.
translation.zh:
密谋 诡计 策划什么的都比不上
一样简简单单的事 那就是现实真相

translation.en: Mama! Oh, what the hell?
translation.zh:
-妈妈
-搞什么情况？

translation.en: Hey, baby.
translation.zh: 宝贝儿 你好啊

translation.en: Oh, flowers, breakfast. Yeah.
translation.zh: 宝贝儿 你好啊 有花有早餐 好棒啊

translation.en: You're a little early, sweetie.
translation.zh: 你来得有点早啊亲爱的

translation.en: I know, but I wanted to come by so I could tell you that...
translation.zh:
我知道
可我就是想要过来和你说件事儿

translation.en: ...I'm not gonna be able to make it to the anniversary today, Mom.
translation.zh:
妈妈
今天我没办法陪你去周年纪念了

translation.en: There's some place I gotta be.
translation.zh: 我有个地方要去

translation.en: Well, it's our 75th at the church.
translation.zh: 可那是我们第75次礼拜

translation.en: What's wrong, sweetie? Where you gotta be?
translation.zh:
有什么事情 亲爱的
你要去哪里来着？

translation.en: With Candace. At her family reunion, Mom.
translation.zh: 去卡丹那里 参加她们家的家庭聚会

translation.en: Well, good for you.
translation.zh: 是嘛 挺好的

translation.en: Okay, sweetie.
translation.zh: 那就去吧 宝贝

translation.en: -Really? -All right.
translation.zh:
-真的
-是的啦

translation.en: Now, I'm gonna see you tomorrow, okay? Time for you to go.
translation.zh:
那我们明天再见了 行吧
你得快点走了

translation.en: Loretta, it's my turn to spank you.
translation.zh: 洛雷塔该轮到我来打你了

translation.en: Deacon Johnson?
translation.zh: 约翰逊执事？

translation.en: -You got the keys for these? -Put those down, fool!
translation.zh:
-你有这玩意儿的钥匙吗？
-把手放下你个蠢货

translation.en: How long has this been going on?
translation.zh: 你们俩这是开始多久了

translation.en: Ninety days.
translation.zh: 90天了

translation.en: More like 91. I'm sorry I stretched your T-shirt.
translation.zh:
其实有91天了
把你衣服绷大了 不好意思

translation.en: How you doing, Michael?
translation.zh: 你还好吗 迈克尔？

translation.en: -All right, fool, go on upstairs now. -You know, these pills cost $19.
translation.zh:
行了蠢蛋 快给我上楼去
要知道小药丸可是要19美元啊

translation.en: Mom, you got him with my loofah?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你还让他用我的丝瓜巾

translation.en: Baby, go on. Go ahead, go ahead.
translation.zh: 宝贝去吧 快去

translation.en: Listen here, fool!
translation.zh: 你个呆子给我听好

translation.en: I done told you I'd bring that coffee upstairs, you old, nasty fool.
translation.zh:
我都说烦了 你个老梆瓜蠢蛋
我会把那咖啡拿上来的

translation.en: Look who I found.
translation.zh: 看看我碰见了谁

translation.en: Okay, third time I hope is a charm.
translation.zh: 好吧 我希望事不过三是好事啊

translation.en: Actually, I think it is.
translation.zh: 事实上 我想说是的

translation.en: -Go ahead, tell them. -We want to make an offer.
translation.zh:
-说吧 告诉她们
-我们想要报个价

translation.en: -I told you this was gonna happen. -No, you didn't, actually.
translation.zh:
-我早告诉你这事儿能成的
-才没有

translation.en: This is great news. We sort of had an instinct about you guys.
translation.zh:
这真是个好消息 我们其实多少
在心里对你们是有点预感的

translation.en: Jeremy, what are you doing here?
translation.zh:
-克里斯汀？
-杰里米 你到这里来做什么？

translation.en: I need to talk to you.
translation.zh: 我得和你谈谈

translation.en: Yeah, I can't. I'm in the middle of something.
translation.zh: 不行 我这正有事

translation.en: This is important.
translation.zh: 可我要说的事情很重要

translation.en: Not a problem. Take your time.
translation.zh: 没问题啊 你们慢慢聊

translation.en: I'm gonna get the paperwork, and we can get started.
translation.zh:
我去准备书面文件
然后我们就能开始洽谈了

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 我真的很抱歉

translation.en: Did someone die?
translation.zh:
-有谁死了么
-什么 不是

translation.en: -What? No. -Well, you have a suit on, so I--
translation.zh:
-有谁死了么
-什么 不是 可你穿着身西装 我就以为

translation.en: I got the job at Neversoft, Kris.
translation.zh:
威软 那份工作我拿到了
克里斯汀

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-是啊

translation.en: I mean, that's cool. I hope you didn't do it for my benefit.
translation.zh:
我是说这挺不错的
希望你别是因为我才那么做的

translation.en: I did. At first.
translation.zh: 一开始的确是

translation.en: But somehow, through all the pretending...
translation.zh: 可后来不知道怎么的 演着演着

translation.en: ...I figured out I wanted it for me.
translation.zh:
我好像慢慢明白了
这其实也是我自己想要的

translation.en: And now that I have it, I want it for us.
translation.zh:
而现在我拿到了这份工作
我明白我是为了我们俩争取的

translation.en: You were the first person I wanted to call when I got the news...
translation.zh:
我一收到消息第一个
就想打电话告诉你

translation.en: ...and the fact that I couldn't drove me crazy.
translation.zh:
可我却不能打给你
那快把我逼疯了

translation.en: You're the last person I think about before I go to sleep at night, Kris.
translation.zh:
每晚在入睡前
你是我脑海里念着的最后一个人

translation.en: Look...
translation.zh: 听我说…

translation.en: ...I miss you.
translation.zh: 我好想你

translation.en: Oh, honey.
translation.zh: 哦 宝贝你看

translation.en: I miss you and I want you back.
translation.zh:
我非常想你
而且我希望你能回到我身边

translation.en: So sweet.
translation.zh: 太甜蜜了

translation.en: I want to buy you a house.
translation.zh: 我想给你买一幢房子

translation.en: That's my man, step up there.
translation.zh: 这才像话嘛 兄弟 雄起啊

translation.en: I want to buy you this house.
translation.zh: 我想给你买这幢房子

translation.en: Back up, bitch. You ain't buying my house.
translation.zh: 给我收手贱人 你可不许和我抢房子

translation.en: Oh, it's fine.
translation.zh: 没事的

translation.en: How the hell he talking about buying my house?
translation.zh: 这家伙说什么要买我的房子？

translation.en: Breathe.
translation.zh: 深呼吸

translation.en: I'm breathing, I'm breathing. I got it, I got it.
translation.zh: 我呼了 我没事

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I want to be your wife. And I want you to be my husband--
translation.zh:
我想成为你的妻子
也希望你能做我的丈夫

translation.en: I want to be your husband.
translation.zh: 是我要做你的丈夫

translation.en: And I want you to be my wife...
translation.zh: 而想要你做我的妻子

translation.en: ...so bad.
translation.zh: 太想了

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: ...will you marry me?
translation.zh: 嫁给我好么？

translation.en: It's a yes.
translation.zh: 是个肯定回答

translation.en: -Oh, she did it. -Go ahead, my man.
translation.zh:
-哦 她成功了
-上吧 少年

translation.en: She did it because she changed the game.
translation.zh: 因为她改变了游戏规则所以成功了

translation.en: -She did what? -Don't worry about it.
translation.zh:
-她做什么了？
-没什么没事

translation.en: Even Zeke was singing a new tune.
translation.zh: 甚至是齐克都改过自新了

translation.en: That last one was Bitch Betta Have My Money by AMG.
translation.zh:
刚才那首是
《女孩最好还钱来》

translation.en: I don't really feel like being out of the house right now.
translation.zh: 我最近其实真的不想外出

translation.en: Come on. You know the best way to get over an old guy is to get a new one.
translation.zh: 得了吧 忘掉旧爱最好的方法就是结识新欢

translation.en: -You're coming. -...make sure you show him some love.
translation.zh:
-你已经来了啊
-希望大家给他一些鼓励

translation.en: Zeke, come on up.
translation.zh: 齐克 请上台来吧

translation.en: -Hey, thank you. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh:
-嘿 谢谢
-哦 天啊

translation.en: I haven't really played this song in years...
translation.zh:
我已经很多年
没有好好弹过这首歌了…

translation.en: Is that--
translation.zh: 那不是…

translation.en: ...but it was inspired by a very special woman who...
translation.zh: 但有一位姑娘鼓励了我…

translation.en: ...is definitely worth waiting for.
translation.zh:
对我来说 她是非常特别的
值得等待的人

translation.en: Last night I had a dream about a dream
translation.zh: 昨晚我做了个梦中梦

translation.en: About you
translation.zh: 关于你

translation.en: -I gotta get out of here. -Mya!
translation.zh:
-我得走了
-玛雅！

translation.en: Mya!
translation.zh: 玛雅！

translation.en: Mya, will you hold up? Mya?
translation.zh: 玛雅 你就等一下好吗？

translation.en: You think you can just sing one song and everything's gonna be forgotten?
translation.zh:
你是不是觉得只要唱首歌
就可以往事不提

translation.en: No! I was just hoping it would be a start.
translation.zh: 没有 我只希望这能成为一个开始

translation.en: You know what? You know, you can't change a person's nature, Zeke.
translation.zh:
你知道吗 齐克
江山易改 本性难移

translation.en: That is not true. I know for a fact that that's not true.
translation.zh: 不是那样的 我发誓不是那样

translation.en: -How? -Because I want to start over.
translation.zh:
-凭什么？
-因为我想重新来过

translation.en: I want 90 more days.
translation.zh: 我想和你重新相处90天

translation.en: Without sex?
translation.zh: 不谈性

translation.en: If that's what it takes.
translation.zh: 如果那是你答应和我重新来过的条件

translation.en: I don't want the sex, Mya. I want you.
translation.zh: 我不需要性 玛雅 我想要的是你

translation.en: That's bullshit.
translation.zh: 全是鬼话

translation.en: Okay, that's bullshit. Yes! Of course I want the sex.
translation.zh:
那的确是鬼话 是的
我当然想要跟你上床

translation.en: But the difference is the sex is all I wanted before I met you. Now...
translation.zh:
但不同是在我遇见你之前
我脑子里只有把妹骗上床 而现在…

translation.en: ...I want you. Okay?
translation.zh: 我只想要你 你懂么？

translation.en: Now? I want coffee.
translation.zh:
而现在呢
我只要和你喝喝咖啡就足够了

translation.en: I want to stay up all night talking about your crazy childhood. I want--
translation.zh:
我想整晚整晚的听你谈
你疯狂的童年轶事 我还想…

translation.en: I don't know. I want to talk about Aristotle's Caves.
translation.zh:
我也不知道怎么说
我还想和你聊聊亚里士多德的洞穴

translation.en: It's Plato's.
translation.zh: 是柏拉图的

translation.en: Plato got caves too?
translation.zh: 柏拉图也有洞穴

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Mya, I love you.
translation.zh: 玛雅 我爱你

translation.en: I'm in love with you.
translation.zh: 我深深地爱上你了

translation.en: I've never said that to anyone in my life.
translation.zh: 这些话 我以前从未对任何人说起过

translation.en: Then why didn't you just say so?
translation.zh: 那你刚刚干吗不这么说出来

translation.en: Turns out that my epiphany had a domino effect.
translation.zh:
结果看来 我之前的顿悟产生了
多米诺效应

translation.en: Everyone was actually stepping up with their women. For real this time.
translation.zh: 所有人都跟自己心爱的姑娘 有了真正的 实质性的进展

translation.en: I didn't get any of this.
translation.zh: 这个我一点都没吃过

translation.en: Candace? Your mother tells me that you're still single.
translation.zh:
卡丹？
你妈妈告诉我 你现在还是单身

translation.en: Don't worry about it, because I think I have a solution.
translation.zh: 别担心 我已经给你想好办法啦

translation.en: I have somebody I think would be perfect for you at my office. Her name is Amy.
translation.zh:
我认识个跟你非常般配的人
是我办公室的 -她的名字叫艾米
-她 她可不是拉拉国的

translation.en: Her? She's not in that chapter.
translation.zh:
-她的名字叫艾米
-她 她可不是拉拉国的

translation.en: Well, she might want to read the book, honey.
translation.zh: 好吧 亲爱的 她真应该读读那本书

translation.en: Mom! Mom!
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: Thanks, Duke. I got this.
translation.zh: 谢啦 杜克我能搞定

translation.en: -Hi, ladies. -Look at that face!
translation.zh:
-女士们 大家好
-看看那张小俊脸

translation.en: Nice to see you all.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你们

translation.en: What are you doing here? Isn't today your mom's church thing?
translation.zh:
你来这儿干什么
今儿不是要陪你妈上教堂吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it is.
translation.zh: 对啊 是今天

translation.en: So, what, did it get canceled?
translation.zh: 所以 怎么 行程取消了

translation.en: It did not. What's up with all these damn questions, woman?
translation.zh:
才没有 怎么啦 妞儿
哪儿来那么多问题呢？

translation.en: I just thought you needed to be there.
translation.zh: 我还以为你必须陪着你妈呢

translation.en: Why would I be there when I should be here...
translation.zh:
为什么我要在那儿呢
在我本该和我生命中

translation.en: ...with the number-one woman in my life?
translation.zh: 排第一位的女人在一起的时候

translation.en: So since you're thinking so much...
translation.zh: 所以说 既然你想这么多

translation.en: ...why don't you think about putting a burger on that plate...
translation.zh: 你怎么不想想拿个盘子 放上个汉堡

translation.en: -...with some pickles and some mustard? -I'm sorry...
translation.zh: 再抓些咸菜和芥末什么的 不好意思

translation.en: ...did you just say "number one"?
translation.zh: 你刚才是说"第一位"吗？

translation.en: Oh, so you're not believing? Hold on one second.
translation.zh: 哦 你还是不相信 等一下啊

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen? Excuse me?
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 打扰一下啊

translation.en: Hi, I need everybody's attention, please? Hey, everybody-- Yeah.
translation.zh: 大家好 大家都请注意听我说 嘿大伙儿

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家

translation.en: My name is Michael Hanover, and I want you all to know...
translation.zh: 我的名字叫迈克尔 我想让每一个人知道

translation.en: ...I am madly, and I am insanely in love with Candace Hall.
translation.zh: 我疯狂的 无可救药的 爱上了卡丹哈尔

translation.en: And I just want everybody in the world to know...
translation.zh: 我希望世界上所有人明白

translation.en: ...that she's the number-one woman in my life.
translation.zh: 她才是我生命中第一重要的女人

translation.en: Thanks, everybody.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家

translation.en: Now, back to the reunion!
translation.zh: 继续聚会吧

translation.en: Is that okay with you?
translation.zh: 还有问题吗？

translation.en: What do you want on your damn burger?
translation.zh: 你想在那倒霉汉堡里夹什么？

translation.en: I don't give a damn, girl. I came for you. Come here.
translation.zh:
我才不管呢 姑娘
我是为你而来的 过来

translation.en: And so the book ended happily for all of us.
translation.zh:
因此 对我们来说
已经书写了圆满的结局

translation.en: Well, almost all of us.
translation.zh: 呃 是我们中的大部分人

translation.en: Hey, girl. Haven't seen you in a while.
translation.zh: 嘿 妞儿 好久不见

translation.en: I know. I'm sorry, I've been swamped.
translation.zh: 我知道 对不住啦 我最近忙死了

translation.en: So, what are you up to later today?
translation.zh: 那你待会儿准备干吗？

translation.en: Actually, I have a date with James, finally.
translation.zh:
其实我一会儿要和詹姆斯约会
终于啊

translation.en: Between his CEO and my COO, it seems we never see each other.
translation.zh:
他是个首席执行官
我们似乎就没有时间来得及好好相处

translation.en: What else is new?
translation.zh: 还有什么新鲜事？

translation.en: Anyway. You got any plans for later?
translation.zh: 没什么了 你待会儿有什么计划吗？

translation.en: Actually, the three of us are going to Dominic's grand opening.
translation.zh:
实际上 我们三个要去
应援多米的盛大开业

translation.en: He found a backer for his restaurant?
translation.zh: 他那餐馆找到赞助人了

translation.en: No. He got a personal loan for a food truck. It's called--
translation.zh: 不是 他自己贷款买了辆餐车 名字叫“迪大道”

translation.en: Avenue D.
translation.zh: 名字叫“迪大道”

translation.en: It's in Pueblo Plaza. He wants to start small, build his way up.
translation.zh:
就在普韦布洛广场
他想先从小地方起步 再慢慢发展

translation.en: Good for him, you know?
translation.zh: 这挺好

translation.en: -Anyway, have fun tonight. -Oh, we will.
translation.zh:
-总之 今晚玩得开心
-哦 那当然

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: So, James, how was your day?
translation.zh: 那么 詹姆斯你今天过得怎么样？

translation.en: It was good. Actually, it was-- It was great.
translation.zh: 挺好 实际上 非常好

translation.en: Did I mention to you that The Wall Street Journal is doing a feature on me?
translation.zh:
我跟你说过华尔街日报
要给我做个专题吗？

translation.en: -Yes, the-- -"Wonderkid." Yeah, I know.
translation.zh:
-知道
-神奇小子 哈哈

translation.en: "The Wonderkid."
translation.zh: 神奇小子

translation.en: I know I'm not exactly a kid...
translation.zh: 你看我已经不是小子了

translation.en: ...but I am the youngest CEO of a Fortune 500 company.
translation.zh:
但我是财富500强里
最年轻的首席执行官

translation.en: Yes, we talked-- Now I'm focusing my sights on the Far East.
translation.zh:
-对啊 我们谈起过
-现在我正着眼于远东地区

translation.en: I was talking to Warren the other day. You know Warren Buffett?
translation.zh:
几天前我跟沃伦谈过了
你知道巴菲特吗？

translation.en: Dub-Beezy, that's my man.
translation.zh: 迪巴 我哥儿们

translation.en: He was telling me about diversification.
translation.zh: 他告诉我要分散投资

translation.en: So I bought a G6. Okay, all right. The company bought a G6.
translation.zh:
所以 我买了架Ｇ6 好吧
其实是公司买了架Ｇ6

translation.en: New York to Los Angeles costs about $60,000.
translation.zh: 从纽约到洛杉矶要六万美元

translation.en: They put that down every time I go.
translation.zh: 这样每次我来就顺路了

translation.en: Also talked to my man, Kobe, the other day.
translation.zh: 哦 还跟我哥儿们科比谈过了

translation.en: He was trying to get me to buy an NBA franchise.
translation.zh: 他想让我买个ＮＢＡ的专营权

translation.en: I'm fine, James.
translation.zh: 我很好 詹姆斯

translation.en: Thanks for asking.
translation.zh: 多谢关心

translation.en: I'm sorry, I don't understand.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我不懂你在说什么

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道你不懂

translation.en: I know, but I finally do.
translation.zh:
我知道
你不懂 可我终于是想通了

translation.en: All right, all right, all right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: All right, a little something.
translation.zh: 好吧 只是一点小意思

translation.en: Just a little sample for the ladies. Fellas, I'll get you back later.
translation.zh:
一些样品给女士们试吃
伙计们 回头再给你们拿啊

translation.en: -Come on, Dom! -Give that to the wife.
translation.zh:
不给力啊 多米
这份给这位太太

translation.en: To your lady, okay, good, there you go.
translation.zh: 这份给这位女士 好了

translation.en: All right, one more? There you go, there you go, J.
translation.zh:
-就这样吧
-好嘞 还要一块 给你 拿好

translation.en: I'll be right back. Thanks for coming.
translation.zh: 我一会儿就过来 多谢捧场

translation.en: -I'll be right back. -This is amazing.
translation.zh:
-一会儿就来
-太好吃了

translation.en: Next!
translation.zh: 下一个

translation.en: I'll take the Chef's Special.
translation.zh: 我想要大厨特色菜

translation.en: Is that with chicken or--
translation.zh: 是加鸡肉的那款还是

translation.en: -Hey, back of the line. -Look, this is personal, not business.
translation.zh:
嘿 后边儿排队去
听着 这可是私事儿 不是做买卖

translation.en: Move your arm!
translation.zh: 起开点儿

translation.en: Congratulations.
translation.zh: 祝贺你

translation.en: Looks like a huge success.
translation.zh: 看上去非常成功

translation.en: I wasn't expecting you.
translation.zh: 我没想到你会来

translation.en: I couldn't miss your grand opening.
translation.zh: 我怎么会错过你的盛大开业呢

translation.en: Live bass ceviche?
translation.zh: 酸橘汁腌鲈鱼

translation.en: Sal, those two lasagnas are to-go.
translation.zh:
莎拉
那两份千层面打包

translation.en: You got it.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: So where's your CEO?
translation.zh: 你的首席执行官呢？

translation.en: I ended that. Dominic!
translation.zh: 我叫停了

translation.en: He may have all the money in the world, and all the power...
translation.zh: 他也许赚了世界上所有的钱 拥有所有的权力

translation.en: -...but he doesn't have half your potential. -Stop!
translation.zh:
-但他连你一半的潜力都没有
-得了吧

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 别说了

translation.en: I don't need you to do that for me anymore. I'm doing me, now.
translation.zh:
-我不需要你再这么做了
-我已经在自己动手努力了

translation.en: All right?
translation.zh: 好么？

translation.en: Thanks for coming, but I got a business to run.
translation.zh: 多谢捧场 但我还得做生意

translation.en: I'm sure you can respect that, right?
translation.zh: 我确信你能理解的 对吗？

translation.en: -But I was-- -Next!
translation.zh:
-但是我
-下一个

translation.en: What's good here, man? Do you have a low-fat Pork Special?
translation.zh:
这儿有什么好吃的
你们有低卡的猪肉特色菜吗？

translation.en: -Sure. -Let's roll with it.
translation.zh:
-当然有
-帮我卷起来

translation.en: Dominic?
translation.zh: 多米？

translation.en: Excuse me. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 稍等 你这是做什么？

translation.en: I want you back, Dominic.
translation.zh: 回到我身边 多米？

translation.en: -Just give me a minute, please. I know. -We gotta finish this up.
translation.zh:
-伙计们 请给我们一点时间
-我们得先做完这菜啊

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I want you back.
translation.zh:
-你想干吗？
-我想你回到我身边

translation.en: Yeah, listen, I'm not an acquisition. You can't just decide--
translation.zh:
好 你听着 我不是你的所有物
你不能随便决定

translation.en: -I'm asking. -Yeah? And I'm asking for some service.
translation.zh:
-我在请求你
-是吗 那我这儿还请求服务呢

translation.en: You'll get your pork sausage, Porky! Beat it!
translation.zh:
你会拿到那倒霉猪肉香肠的
猪肉仔 起开点儿

translation.en: Lauren, listen, we're just too different, okay?
translation.zh:
劳伦
听着 我们相差太远 好吗？

translation.en: Yes, we are different. But I think that's a good thing.
translation.zh:
是的 我们的确不同
但我觉得那是好事儿

translation.en: What you need is status. You need titles.
translation.zh:
-你要的是地位 你要的是头衔
-不 我不在乎

translation.en: -I don't care about-- -No, I don't.
translation.zh:
-我不在乎
-不

translation.en: What I need is a man who makes me feel like I'm special.
translation.zh:
我所需要的是一个
能让我感到自己很特别的男人

translation.en: I don't care about his title...
translation.zh: 我不在乎他的头衔

translation.en: ...and I don't care how much money you make.
translation.zh: 我也不在乎你挣多少钱

translation.en: I don't care what kind of car you drive. I just need you.
translation.zh:
我也不在乎你开的什么车
我就是需要你

translation.en: Please? I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 求你 我错了

translation.en: I think ultimately we want different things.
translation.zh:
我还是觉得最终
我们想要的东西不一样

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不对

translation.en: I disagree.
translation.zh: 我不同意

translation.en: I think we want the exact same thing.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们想要的东西是一样的

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 是什么

translation.en: Well, first...
translation.zh: 首先

translation.en: ...I would like to have my Chef's Special, hold the pork.
translation.zh: 我想要主厨特色菜 有猪肉的那种

translation.en: Go, Dom! All right, come on, man, that's enough kissing.
translation.zh: 上啊 多米好哎 嘿伙计 亲够了没

translation.en: -Grab her ass or something. -That's my girl!
translation.zh: 摸摸她的屁股还是什么的 这才是我的好姑娘

translation.en: Show me something, God! Give me something to think about tonight.
translation.zh: 来点儿猛料 让我晚上有个念想

translation.en: You know I haven't had much sex.
translation.zh: 你知道我最近都没怎么做爱了

translation.en: Me and Gail ain't really doing it like we used to.
translation.zh: 我和卡尔都不像以前那么激情了

translation.en: Really, Cedric?
translation.zh: 你说什么 赛德

translation.en: -Come on, now. -Get your little ass over here, now!
translation.zh:
-来吧 现在
-把你那小屁股挪过来 快点儿！

translation.en: Hey, Gail, I was talking--
translation.zh: 嘿 卡尔我还没讲完呢

translation.en: Pull your pants up, Cedric!
translation.zh: 把你裤子拉好 赛德！

translation.en: I'll get the guy in the purple.
translation.zh: 我去跟那穿紫衣服的

translation.en: -Hi, I'm Bennett. -Use our ball?
translation.zh:
-嘿 我是版纳德
-用咱的球

translation.en: I'll see you on the court! Save it-- Save it for the game, though!
translation.zh:
咱有种场上见 省省吧你
你给我省点力气留着比赛吧

translation.en: Listen, little man. Where's your twin?

translation.en: You're gonna need somebody on your shoulders.
translation.zh: 你得在肩膀上再架个人才够

translation.en: That's funny. That's real funny.
translation.zh: 真好笑 哦 真正好笑

translation.en: Let's see if it's funny when my balls are on your back!
translation.zh:
等我淡定地走你后门儿的时候
我看你还好笑不好笑

translation.en: -Ball's in play. Let's go. -Oh, shit.
translation.zh:
-开始了 咱么走
-哦 该死！

translation.en: Pass the ball, man!
translation.zh: 传球啊 老兄

translation.en: You gonna play some defense?
translation.zh: 你得加强防守

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait!
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Pass!
translation.zh: 我过

translation.en: Just shoot the ball.
translation.zh: 赶快射篮吧你

translation.en: You better get that out of here, little man. You all right?
translation.zh:
小矮人
你最好赶紧离开吧 还好吧你？

translation.en: Hey, no making fun.
translation.zh: 嘿 别调戏我

translation.en: Good shot.
translation.zh: 好球

translation.en: -Good shot? -It was!
translation.zh:
-好球
-的确是好球啊

translation.en: -Bennett, be a man and push him! -It was a good shot.
translation.zh:
-版纳德像个男人推他
-那的确是个好球

translation.en: Pick on someone your own size, man.
translation.zh: 有种找比你个儿大的欺负

translation.en: Oh, my knee!
translation.zh: 哦 我的膝盖

translation.en: Man, you better calm down.
translation.zh: 哥儿们 你最好镇静点儿

translation.en: He put his balls on my head.
translation.zh: 他那个地方杵到我头了

translation.en: Where's my help on defense?
translation.zh: 我的侧防呢

translation.en: Get out of here!
translation.zh: 快滚蛋吧

translation.en: Bennett! Jeremy!
translation.zh: 版纳德 杰里米！

translation.en: I'm trying to get my ball back! Can I have the ball, please?
translation.zh:
我正准备去拿球
能拿回我们的球吗？

translation.en: Just let them keep it. Let them keep it.
translation.zh: 给他们吧 给他们吧

translation.en: -Thanks, you guys! -Go get that.
translation.zh:
-谢谢 伙计们
-去拿你的球吧

translation.en: Hey, we play here every Thursday.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们每周四都在这儿打

translation.en: That wasn't that bad.
translation.zh: 没那么糟吧

translation.en: Think about it.
translation.zh: 想想看

translation.en: Well, I think it was a good time. It's all about the exercise, guys.
translation.zh:
我觉得挺好啊
不都是为了多运动嘛 伙计们
